trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of service instances available for handling calls that are contained in incoming messages.
trans-unit.target: 指定服務執行個體可用於處理內送訊息中所包含的呼叫的數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName> manages the association between the channel and the user-defined service objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName>管理通道和使用者定義之服務物件之間的關聯。</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the InstanceContextMode enumeration with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to specify the lifetime of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用的 InstanceContextMode 列舉<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性，以指定的存留期<xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>物件。</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] can create a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object for every call, every session or specify that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object is bound to a single service object.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]可以建立新<xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>每次呼叫時，每個工作階段物件，或指定<xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>物件繫結至單一服務物件。</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: For a working example, see the [Instancing](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需實用範例，請參閱[執行個體](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The Single value specifies that a single <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object should be used for the lifetime of the service.
trans-unit.target: 單一值會指定單一<xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>物件應該用於服務的存留期間。</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A> value is set to Single the result is that your service can only process one message at a time unless you also set the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConcurrencyMode%2A> value to <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果的<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A>值設定為單一結果是您的服務可以只處理一個訊息一次除非您也可以設定<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConcurrencyMode%2A>為<xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>值</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConcurrencyMode%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object is created prior to and recycled subsequent to each call.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>物件是之前建立，而且每次呼叫之後回收。</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: If the channel does not create a session this value behaves as if it were PerCall.
trans-unit.target: 如果通道不會在工作階段建立此值的行為就好像 PerCall。

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object is created for each session.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>每個工作階段會建立物件。</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: Only one <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object is used for all incoming calls and is not recycled subsequent to the calls.
trans-unit.target: 只有一個<xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>物件是否使用所有傳入的呼叫，且不會回收之後呼叫。</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: If a service object does not exist, one is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果服務物件不存在，會建立一個。
